title: Lower priority and "Trying to reconnect" issue
body:
Hello guys,
after like 10 min in lower priorty (sometimes longer), i get the "trying to reconnect" msg and the lower priority resets himself or i have to start back from 20min. I already did: reinstall and hextech repair tool. Im out of ideas and really need help. I got no connection problems ingame or whatever just sometimes in start hub. Would be nice if someone got some exotic idea to fix this.... no trolls pls ty

cy@

replies.body: The uncertainty of a disconnection can be pretty frustrating, so I don't recommend queuing up for games until this is resolved.  Instead your best bet may be to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix up the instability preventing you from getting into the game sometimes.  The HRT is good but a reinstall won't really help in this case, though auto-configuring your firewall settings might!
